item.title: France Railway Attacks Force New UK PM To Change Olympics Travel Plan
item.description: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer changed his travel plans to get to the Olympics on Friday after Eurostar trains were disrupted due to sabotage attacks against French rail networks, Downing Street said.

item.title: U.K. Drops Opposition to I.C.C. Warrants for Netanyahu and Gallant
item.description: The new Labour government said it would drop the previous government’s objection to I.C.C. arrest warrants for Israel’s Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and the defense minister, Yoav Gallant.

item.title: Mexico not told of cartel arrests until kingpins were in U.S. custody
item.description: The capture of Sinaloa cartel leaders Ismael “El Mayo” Zambada and Joaquín Guzmán López were a historic coup for U.S. agents against a syndicate that’s flooded the United States with fentanyl.

item.title: 'Biden should bring the Americans home’: Freed Hamas hostage on ceasefire deal
'Their messaging was white power': White supremacists march in Howell
Prisoners fight against working in heat on former slave plantation, raising hope for change in South
